title: Allow other formats than PCM and float for a FrameOutputNode created with CreateFrameOutputNode of class AudioGraph
body: Allow other formats than PCM and float for a FrameOutputNode created with CreateFrameOutputNode of class AudioGraph.

comments.body: Other Formats like MP3 or OGG would be nice. One Scenario is that of a shoutcast source for Internet Radio streaming. A shoutcast source transmits MP3 data via TCP to a shoutcast Server. If a FrameOutputNode would allow to get the encoded MP3 data then that data could easily transmitted via a TCP Stream. Currently I have to save a MP3 stream to a file and then read from the file and transmit it over TCP. This burden would be eliminated would MP3 Frames be available by the FrameOutputNode.
